mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club( name, introduce, description, maxPeople, storedFolder, storedFile, originalFileName, fileSize, location, concern, uno) VALUES ( #{name}, #{introduce}, #{description}, #{maxPeople}, #{storedFolder}, #{storedFile}, #{originalFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{location}, #{concern}, #{uno} );
INSERT INTO clubmember( cno, uno, name, id, authority) VALUES ( #{cno}, #{uno}, #{name}, #{id}, #{authority} );
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM clubmember WHERE cno = #{cno} and uno = #{uno}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM clubmember WHERE cno = #{cno}

SELECT c.cno, c.name, c.introduce, count(*) as currentPeople, c.maxPeople, c.location, c.concern, c.storedFolder, c.storedFile, CONCAT("/photo/", c.storedFolder, "/", c.storedFile) as imgurl FROM (SELECT club.*, timeline.regDate FROM club JOIN timeline ON club.cno = timeline.cno) c, clubmember cm WHERE c.cno = cm.cno ORDER BY c.regDate DESC

SELECT c.cno, c.name, c.introduce, count(*) as currentPeople, c.maxPeople, c.location, c.concern, c.storedFolder, c.storedFile, CONCAT("/photo/", c.storedFolder, "/", c.storedFile) as imgurl FROM club c, clubmember cm WHERE c.cno = cm.cno AND c.cno = #{cno}

SELECT c.cno, c.name, c.introduce, count(*) as currentPeople, c.maxPeople, c.location, c.concern, c.storedFolder, c.storedFile, CONCAT("/photo/", c.storedFolder, "/", c.storedFile) as imgurl FROM club c, clubmember cm WHERE c.cno = cm.cno WHERE c.location like CONCAT("%",#{location},"%") OR c.concern like CONCAT("%",#{concern}, "%") ORDER BY c.name ASC

SELECT c.cno, c.name, c.introduce, count(*) as currentPeople, c.maxPeople, c.location, c.concern, c.storedFolder, c.storedFile, CONCAT("/photo/", c.storedFolder, "/", c.storedFile) as imgurl FROM club c, clubmember cm WHERE c.cno = cm.cno AND c.uno = #{uno} ORDER BY c.name ASC
